thread.title: Man killed in workplace accident in Christchurch
thread.title_full: Man killed in workplace accident in Christchurch

author: Sam Sherwood
title: Man killed in workplace accident in Christchurch
text:
Man killed in workplace accident in Christchurch SAM SHERWOOD Last updated 12:25, February 28 2017 MARION VAN DIJK/FAIRFAX NZ 
The man died at work on Tuesday morning. 
A 52-year-old man has died after he was crushed at a workplace in Christchurch. 
The incident happened at a premises on Waterloo Rd, Sockburn, about 10am on Tuesday. 
A police spokeswoman said the man died after he was crushed. Further details on what happened were not yet available. 
Detective Sergeant Dorothy Mcphail said police were speaking to the man's family and offered their condolences "at this difficult time". 
Police are speaking to the family and offer their condolences at this difficult time. 
WorkSafe is investigating the man's death.
